document.full_text: the no-fly zone over libya could end up costing the western coalition more than $1 billion if the operation drags on more than a couple of months, defense analysts say.
document.title: libya no-fly zone cost could hit $1 billion in months
lines_and_colors: the no-fly zone over libya could end up costing the western coalition more than $1 billion if the operation drags on more than a couple of months, defense analysts say.
